TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_mibalud_tu_lalami, title = mibalud_tu_lalami, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/mibalud_tu_lalami} }

S.FORM: mukaled tu lalami :sayaway mibili' tu kapahay a lalami kakaleten. musilud tu lalami tu kakaleden misalaic 整理稻草好編繩 Balud han ku lalami, siketen tu laic ku lalami . cacay a malumaluy, tusa a malumaluy, sakatusa a malumaluy i ayaw nu sakacacay a malumaluy, tengtengen ku lalami tu laic. Pasasiket tu lalami amin anu tadayadah ku lalami, caay kamin masanga', kyu baluden aca pasukasen . Kasenengan sa ci Kala ayda kuni katinengan. tunalimaan 好羨慕Kala,

mokaled to lalami :sayaway mibili' to kapahay a lalami kakaleten. mosilod to lalami to kakaleden misalaic 整理稻草好編繩 Balod han ko lalami, siketen to laic ko lalami . cacay a malomaloy, tosa a malomaloy, sakatosa a malomaloy i ayaw no sakacacay a malomaloy, tengtengen ko lalami to laic. Pasasiket to lalami amin ano tadayadah ko lalami, caay kamin masanga', kyo baloden aca pasokasen . Kasenengan sa ci Kala ayda koni katinengan. tonalimaan 好羨慕Kala,
